verbs.description: SEOUL , South Korea — South Korean President Moon Jae - in [V: has] shaken off a suggestion that he receive the Nobel Peace Prize , saying that U.S. President Donald Trump " should win the Nobel prize " as long as the Koreas receive peace in return , according to a Korean official who briefed the media on M ...
